articles.author: Sean Lyngaas
articles.title: Millions of Americans’ personal data exposed in global hack - CNN
articles.description: Millions of people in Louisiana and Oregon have had their data compromised in the sprawling cyberattack that has also hit the US federal government, state agencies said late Thursday.
articles.content:
Millions of people in Louisiana and Oregon have had their data compromised in the sprawling cyberattack that has also hit the US federal government, state agencies said late Thursday.
